mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for DePriest, Robert D.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Lewis Co., W VA [Lewis County, West Virginia]
Weston, Lewis Co., VA [Weston, Lewis County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: DePriest, Robert D. Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture. Laceration of the distal phalanges of the ring and little fingers of right hand . Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Shell. Result: Furloughed 1864/12/31. Recovery and returned to duty 1865/01/10.
